description.value:
You can @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.Item.8Ctt1vOsZuKXxAIN]{sneak attack} using an attack of opportunity, even if you don't otherwise meet the criteria.

As usual, once you @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.Item.8Ctt1vOsZuKXxAIN]{sneak attack}, you can't sneak attack again until the beginning of your next turn.
